verses.verse: (For the choir director; on a stringed instrument. [A Psalm] of David.) <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H7440>cry,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H7181>Give<s%> <S%H7181>heed<s%> to my <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>

From the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> I <S%H7121>call<s%> to Thee, when my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H5848>faint;<s%> <S%H5148>Lead<s%> me to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> that is <S%H7311>higher<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> I.
For Thou hast <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for me, A <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H5797>strength<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H340>enemy.<s%>
Let me <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in Thy <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> Let me <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in the <S%H5643>shelter<s%> of Thy <S%H3671>wings.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
For Thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H5088>vows,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> [me] the <S%H3425>inheritance<s%> of those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
Thou wilt <S%H3254>prolong<s%> the king's <S%H3117>life;<s%> His <S%H8141>years<s%> will be as <S%H1755>many<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
He will <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> <S%H4487>Appoint<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth,<s%> that they may <S%H5341>preserve<s%> him.
<S%H3651>So<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praise<s%> to Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5703>forever,<s%> That I may <S%H9608>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day.<s%>
